target: 2018 Midterms: Will There Be a Blue Wave?. A recent poll from NPR/Marist finds that Democrats are 12 points ahead when respondents were asked which party they are likely to vote for in the 2018 midterms. Many on the Right say that the hype is overblown, citing many races where the Republican candidates are ahead of their challengers.
